Discover Paradise in Uvita & Ojochal

Where the rainforest meets the Pacific, and adventure awaits around every corner

Welcome to Costa Rica's Hidden Gem

Biodiversity

Costa Rica, and the Puntarenas province in particular, attracts ecotourists, biologists, botanists -- this place is a naturalist's paradise.

Activities & Adventures

From surfing and hiking to waterfall rappelling, discover endless possibilities for adventure.

Slow Living

Embrace the Pura Vida lifestyle in our vibrant communities, where nature and modern comfort coexist.
